name: SAPO Technology JSC
description:
Sapo is the most popular omnichannel eCommerce Platforms in Vietnam with more than 55,000 customers. Sapo brings the most complete solutions to stores, retailers which includes: Sapo POS - retail POS system, Sapo Web - Web design, Sapo GO - online retail platform, Sapo FnB - Restaurant & Cafe management.
Especially, Sapo Omnichannel - our multichannel retail system helps our customers with sales from different channels, inventory management, customerâ€™s information, and orders in one place - Sapo Admin.
